name: Admiralo Island Witches Club (Demo)
description:
Join the after school witches club!

Admiralo Island Witches Club is a women-positive, narrative-driven game with a focus on friendship, mystery and adventure.  Attend classes, explore the island and befriend nature spirits with the other girls of the witches club.

This demo introduces the world and the characters and takes about 20-30 minutes to play.  Follow for game updates, art and more!

+++++++++++++++

Staff
story, character art, scripting cloverfirefly (twitter)
backgrounds Robin Kaplan (tumblr)
music fluffy (twitter)

++++++++++++++

Please note:  This is a demo and somethings may change before the release of the game.  This includes character designs, story details, etc.  We appreciate your understanding!
